Headline: Temporary #50 Damen Reroute near Damen/Polk
ShortDescription: #50 Damen buses temp. rerouted near Damen/Polk.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#50 Damen buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to street blockage near Damen/Polk.

Northbound buses will operate via Damen, Taylor , Western, Jackson, Damen, and resume normal route.

Southbound buses will operate via Damen, Van Buren, Western, Taylor, Damen, and resume normal route.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Temporary Southbound #57 Laramie Reroute near Laramie/Madison
ShortDescription: Southbound #57 Laramie buses are temporarily rerouted near Laramie/Madison.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #57 Laramie buses are temporarily rerouted via Laramie, Madison, Cicero, Harrison, Laramie, and resume normal route, due to street blockage near Laramie/Madison.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
